You just got a job in Auckland. Now where to live?
This application color codes Auckland's area units by their affordability to you. Here affordability is based on rent, commute, parking, and car ownership cost estimates determined by your answers to the questions below.

  1. Median gross annual income of
    employed Aucklanders ($45,864)
  2. How many bedrooms will your dwelling have?
    • 1
    • 2
    • 3
    • 4
    • 5

  3. For how many of these bedrooms will you pay rent?
    • 1
    • 2
    • 3
    • 4
    • 5

  4. Where will you work? Move the red map marker.
  5. How will you commute?
